get_entry_season

Source: R/entry_functions.R
get_entry_season.Rd

This function fetches in-season statistics for a Fantasy Premier League entry given the entry ID(s). IMPORTANT NOTE: FPL generally asks scrapers NOT to abuse the /entry sites (see: https://fantasy.premierleague.com/robots.txt).

get_entry_season(entryid = NULL)

Arguments

entryid

The entry ID(s). Can be found on the FPL website under 'Gameweek history' in the URL - https://fantasy.premierleague.com/a/entry/XXXXXX/history. You can list multiple, e.g. with c().

Examples

get_entry_season(1076)
#>           id movement points total_points    rank rank_sort overall_rank
#> 1       1076      new    112          112     593       593          593
